sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to: analyze website traffic, remember your login/settings preferences, enable social media features, and personalize content.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: Essential (required for site function), Performance (analytics), Functional (preferences), Targeting (advertising). You can control non-essential cookies.

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Services like Google Analytics may set cookies. We don't control these directly - refer to their respective privacy policies.

sections.title: 5. Managing Cookies
sections.content: Adjust browser settings to refuse cookies (help guides available for Chrome, Safari, Firefox, etc.). Note: some features may not work without essential cookies.

sections.title: 6. Consent
sections.content: By continuing to use our site without changing your settings, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.
